interactivity.requirements: Weekdays except Tuesday 40 Rin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Sketchy Basement " from Rin Rokuhara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Rin at the School Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Rin and Futaba have just finished redecorating their dorm room. Rin is full of energy and enthusiasm, and eventually reveals that she has arranged to go an arcade with Otoha â€” she calls it a date, although she didn't say that to Otoha, and acknowledges that she doesn't actually know if Otoha is into girls yet. Rin is a bit nervous about how it will go, and Sensei and Futaba try to reassure her.
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on the following: If Sensei broke his promise to Rin by seeing Schadenfreude before What's Done is Done . If Sensei has seen Ahead of the Curve .
If Sensei broke his promise to Rin by seeing Schadenfreude before What's Done is Done .
If Sensei has seen Ahead of the Curve .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p2.
